member.name: T:vmAPI.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.

member.name: P:vmAPI.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurück, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:vmAPI.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.name: P:vmAPI.vmInterface.DisplayName
member.summary: The Display name of your plugin.

member.name: P:vmAPI.vmInterface.Description
member.summary: The Description of your plugin.

member.name: P:vmAPI.vmInterface.ID
member.summary: The ID (GUID) of your plugin.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmInterface.Init
member.summary: This is invoked when your plugin is loaded.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmInterface.Dispose
member.summary: This is invoked when VoiceMacro is terminated.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmInterface.ReceiveParams(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This is invoked when a macro is sending parameters.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmInterface.ProfileSwitched(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This is invoked when a profile is switched.

member.name: T:vmAPI.vmProfile
member.summary: This is the structure for a profile.

member.name: F:vmAPI.vmProfile.ProfileName
member.summary: The name of a profile.

member.name: F:vmAPI.vmProfile.GUID
member.summary: Unique ID of the profile.

member.name: F:vmAPI.vmProfile.Commands
member.summary: A list of commands.

member.name: T:vmAPI.Commands
member.summary: This is the structure for a command.

member.name: F:vmAPI.Commands.RecocnitionText
member.summary: The name and recognitiontext of a command.

member.name: F:vmAPI.Commands.GUID
member.summary: unique ID of the command.

member.name: T:vmAPI.KeyboardAction
member.summary: This is the structure for a Keyboard action.

member.name: F:vmAPI.KeyboardAction.ClickDownUp
member.summary: (0 = Click, 1 = Down, 2 = Up).

member.name: F:vmAPI.KeyboardAction.ClickDuration
member.summary: Click duration in milliseconds.

member.name: F:vmAPI.vmCommand.APIClass
member.summary: Used to store VoiceMacro's API class, not used by plugins.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmCommand.zRegistervmclass(System.Object)
member.summary: Registers VoiceMacro's API class, not used by plugins.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmCommand.GetVariable(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of a variable by name. Returns "ERR!" if variable is not existing. Note: Only works for profile (_p), global (_g) and saved (_s) variables. Specify GUIDP if you want to get a Variable not from current profile.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmCommand.SetVariable(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value of a variable by name. Creates the variable if not existing. Note: Only works for profile (_p), global (_g) and saved (_s) variables. Specify GUIDP if you want to set a Variable not from current profile.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmCommand.AddLogEntry(System.String,System.Drawing.Color,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a text to the log file with a specific color. text is the message, color is the color of the log sign, ID is your plugin ID, sign is your sign (only 1 character allowed), statusText is showed in the status bar of the main window.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmCommand.GetProfiles
member.summary: Returns all the profiles and commands as List(Of vmProfile).

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmCommand.ExecuteMacro(System.String)
member.summary: Starts a macro by Profile/Macro GUID.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmCommand.GetActiveProfileGUID
member.summary: Gets active Profile GUID. "No Profile" is returned if there is none.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmCommand.CommandExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a command exists. Returns Profile GUID/Macro GUID of the command.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmCommand.GetDataDirectory
member.summary: Returns VoiceMacro's Data Directory.

member.name: M:vmAPI.vmCommand.SendKey(vmAPI.KeyboardAction)
member.summary: Sends a key.
